702883f-a.text:
2000-84th Street, south side, from, but not including 20th to, but not including 21st Aves. This is a view of the "Columbus" Bensonhurst's
first elevator apartment house.
September 1928.

702884f-b.text:
(1)
84th Street, north side, between Twenty First and Twentieth Aves., showing a view of St. James Methodist Episcopal Church and
Chapel.
February 3, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from another angle.
February 3, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
